text: Ani adamacya dona putranca kis'sa tyanna vacuna aikava. Jevha tya doghanni eka eka kurbani sadara keli tevha ekaci kurbani svikarali geli ani dusaryaci svikarali geli nahi, tevha to mhanala ki mi niscita tula thara karina, tyavara to mhanala ki allaha, duracarapasuna dura rahanarya lokancica kurbani kabula karato
